Package net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.generator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationAwareResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all resource generator, which wanted to have information about the .
    CssResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all objects, which generates CSS resources.
    InitializingResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all resource generator, which are aware of property initialization.
    LocaleAwareResourceGenerator
    The interface of objects which can handle locale aware resources
    PostInitializationAwareResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all resource generator, which wanted to be triggered when all their properties has been set.
    ResourceGenerator
    A ResourceGenerator is acomponent that generates script or CSS dynamically, instead of reading it from the contents of a WAR file.
    ResourceReaderHandlerAwareResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all resource generator, which wanted to have information about the .
    SpecificCDNDebugPathResourceGenerator
    The interface for ResourceGenerator which specify the debug path for the CDN.
    StreamResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all class which generates image resources.
    TextResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all class which generates image resources.
    TypeAwareResourceGenerator
    This interface is implemented by all resource generator, which wants to be informed of the resource type which they are managing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCSSGenerator
    Abstract implementation of ResourceGenerator with a default return value for the getMappingPrefix method.
    AbstractJavascriptGenerator
    Abstract implementation of ResourceGenerator with a default return value for the getMappingPrefix method.
    GeneratorContext
    Encapsulates the parameters needed in Generators.
    GeneratorRegistry
    Registry for resource generators, which create scripts or CSS data dynamically, as opposed to the usual behavior of reading a resource from the war file.
    IECssBundleGenerator
    This class defines a generator which will bundle all the CSS defines in parameter.
    JavascriptStringUtil  
    ResourceGeneratorReaderProxyFactory
    This class defines the Factory which creates a proxy to ResourceReader objects from a Resource generator.
    ResourceGeneratorReaderWrapper
    This class defines the wrapper class for resource generator in text resource reader.
    SkinSwitcherJsGenerator
    This generator defines the generator which generates the themeSwicther javascript file.
    StreamResourceGeneratorReaderWrapper
    This class defines the class which wraps a stream resource generator in a stream resource reader
